<h3> ABOUT ME </h3>

I am a **committed and passionate Textile Engineer** with hands-on experience in **textile production, sustainable dyeing, and startup innovation**. Currently pursuing my **Master’s in Computer Science**, I focus on merging **UX design, data analytics, and fashion-tech product management**.  

With **marketing experience at Mangorio** and **leadership roles at MUET**, I combine creativity, technology, and business insights to deliver impactful solutions.
